author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Enable the useful analyzers in SimG4CMS/Calo to run in the same step as simulation

#### PR validation:

The crashes in earlier runs are removed. It is essentially rearrangement of files. The standard workflows are unaffected.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim37 Enable the useful analyzer to run in the same step as simulation
